thread.title: BRIEF-UMC's Xiamen subsidiary to acquire intangible assets for T$4.8 bln
thread.title_full: BRIEF-UMC's Xiamen subsidiary to acquire intangible assets for T$4.8 bln | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-UMC's Xiamen subsidiary to acquire intangible assets for T$4.8 bln
text:
Oct 23 United Microelectronics Corp
* Says Xiamen subsidiary to acquire assets for T$4.8 billion ($148.27 million)
Source text on Eikon:
Further company coverage: ($1 = 32.3730 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
